info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 4:05PM EST until January 23 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Southern Berkshire County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 5 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning commute, and may linger into the Monday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates between a half inch and one inch per hour are possible tonight into Monday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
